attributes.action: Allow  Grandparents the legal right to have first option in the adoption of their grandchildren if their birth parents fall short of their care and well being
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see a petition created in which Grandparents are given the first right to adopt their grandchildren as opposed to the children being put up for adoption with complete strangers who are outside  the family nucleus. 
Grandchildren are an integral part of a family and if grandparents feel that they are capable and able to take care of them if, for whatever reason, neither of the birth parents are capable of caring for them, then they should have the first right to step in and take care of them.
